data.eml:eml: A new species of Corydalus Latreille, 1802 (Megaloptera, Corydalidae) and first record of C. clavijoi Contreras-Ramos, 2002 and C. nubilus Erichson, 1848 from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ardila-Camacho, Adrian (2014): A new species of Corydalus Latreille, 1802 (Megaloptera, Corydalidae) and first record of C. clavijoi Contreras-Ramos, 2002 and C. nubilus Erichson, 1848 from Colombia. Zootaxa 3811 (1): 107-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3811.1.6
